name: Down Under (anactualhuman)
description:
Avoid obstacle after obstacle and time your jumps precisely in this platformer. 

Made for Ludum Dare 48 by anactualhuman.

Font used: m3x6 by Daniel Linssen.

Controls:
  • Dig: Press X to dig the tile below you, walk towards a tile on your left or right and press X to dig.
  • Restart: Press R.
  • Movement: Press LEFT/RIGHT arrow keys.
  • Jump: Press the UP arrow key.
Changelog 27th of April 2021
  • Fixed a gamebreaking crash and multiple memory related issues
  • Added a Linux build
